When I received the outfit it came with 2 strips of plaid fabric that I assume would be the "Headband" described and the belt.  Very unsatisfactory given a mom's lack of time to "futz" with tying a headband on the baby and tying the belt.  When I saw the ad, I assumed that the headband would just slip on (as most others do) and that the belt was attached to the pants.
This is by far one of my favorite outfits to put my baby girl in. The pants are so incredibly soft and the bow isn’t too tight. It’s so cute, light and breathable. Highly recommend.

评论概述: The hair bow is not premade!
评论详情: Just be aware that the hair bow is just a long tie that you tie around the baby's head.  It's not an actual bow with an elastic headband.  Probably won't stay on.  Not sure I'm going to include it with the gift.  Also the pants have belt loops and another tie around the waist.  VERY wrinkled fabric!  Had to iron the tie and bows to uncurl them after coming out of the dryer.  Too much work for a new mom!  Would not recommend for new moms.
